DataElement.preferredName: Vascular Injury During Surgical Procedure Occurrence Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free-text field to describe another vascular injury that occurred during the surgical procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vascular Injury During Surgical Procedure Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Relating to or containing blood vessels._Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity._At some point in a given period of time._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to or containing blood vessels.:Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Concepts.definition: Relating to or containing blood vessels.
Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.
